title: Have you found the reason to live? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. Not only that, I - as in this person / being, responding to this particular question at this moment - also found out, to my utter amusement, that the reason is exactly the same for all Homo Sapiens, irrespective of nationality, religion, language, wealth, social status, etc. Reason… Purpose… Objective… Goal… call it whatever… the purpose of a(ny) being born as a human, is to realise the Truth (about Creator, creation, existence, et al) and attain Mukthi (the ultimate liberation from the repetitive birth-death life cycle spiral). In this ancient culture, this has been common knowledge for millennia, and millions have strived to attain this. Many have actually attained it as well. I became aware of this eternal Truth, when a Guru (Realised Master) happened in this lifetime, and altered the course of my life journey, decisively. May Grace make that happen to you as well, in this lifetime itself. Shambho! ~Swamy | `@PrakashSwamy
